00027 private:
00035   class GridCoord
00036   {
00037   public:
00040     int x;
00041     int y;
00042     int z;
00045   public:
00050     GridCoord()
00051       :x(0), y(0), z(0) {};
00052 
00056     GridCoord(int x, int y)
00057       :x(x), y(y), z(0) {};
00058 
00062     GridCoord(int x, int y, int z)
00063       :x(x), y(y), z(z) {};
00064 
00068     GridCoord(const GridCoord& o)
00069       :x(o.x), y(o.y), z(o.z) {};
00070 
00076         GridCoord(const Coord& c, const Coord& gridCellSize = Coord(1.0,1.0,1.0))
00077             : x( static_cast<int>(c.x / gridCellSize.x) )
00078             , y( static_cast<int>(c.y / gridCellSize.y) )
00079             , z( static_cast<int>(c.z / gridCellSize.z) )
00080         {}
00081 
00083         std::string info() const {
00084       std::stringstream os;
00085       os << "(" << x << "," << y << "," << z << ")";
00086       return os.str();
00087     }
00088 
00090     friend bool operator==(const GridCoord& a, const GridCoord& b) {
00091       return a.x == b.x && a.y == b.y && a.z == b.z;
00092     }
00093 
00095     friend bool operator!=(const GridCoord& a, const GridCoord& b) {
00096       return !(a==b);
00097     }
00098   };
00099 
00105   class CoordSet {
00106   protected:
00108     std::vector<GridCoord*> data;
00110     unsigned maxSize;
00112     unsigned size;
00114     unsigned current;
00115 
00116   protected:
00117 
00126     void insert(const GridCoord& c, unsigned pos) {
00127       if(data[pos] == 0) {
00128         data[pos] = new GridCoord(c);
00129         size++;
00130       } else {
00131         if(*data[pos] != c) {
00132           insert(c, (pos + 2) % maxSize);
00133         }
00134       }
00135     }
00136 
00137   public:
00141     CoordSet(unsigned sz)
00142       :data(), maxSize(sz), size(0), current(0)
00143     {
00144       data.resize(maxSize);
00145     }
00146 
00150     ~CoordSet() {
00151       for(std::vector<GridCoord*>::const_iterator it = data.begin(); it != data.end(); ++it) {
00152         if(*it) {
00153           delete *it;
00154         }
00155       }
00156     }
00157 
00163     void add(const GridCoord& c) {
00164       unsigned hash = (c.x * 10000 + c.y * 100 + c.z) % maxSize;
00165       insert(c, hash);
00166     }
00167 
00172     GridCoord* next() {
00173       for(;current < maxSize; current++) {
00174         if(data[current] != 0) {
00175           return data[current++];
00176         }
00177       }
00178       return 0;
00179     }
00180 
00184     unsigned getSize() const { return size; }
00185 
00191     unsigned getmaxSize() const { return maxSize; }
00192   };
